changeSet.author: Wube
changeSet.sql: create table odos_crrs_svc.conf_rm ( conf_rm_id serial not null, rm_num int not null, rm_name varchar(200) not null, rm_capcity int not null, rm_active_ind odos_crrs_svc.activ_ind, bldg_id int not null references odos_crrs_svc.bldg (bldg_id), primary key (conf_rm_id) );
